greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k), n >= 0, in which n-th row (for n >= 3) lists prime factors of Fibonacci(n) (see A000045), with repetition.
maple: with(numtheory): with(combinat): for i from 3 to 50 do for j from 1 to nops(ifactors(fibonacci(i))[2]) do for k from 1 to ifactors(fibonacci(i))[2][j][2] do printf(`%d,`, ifactors(fibonacci(i))[2][j][1]) od: od: od:
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 07 2001
ext: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 09 2001
